tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE impact_on_marine_life (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    impact_type VARCHAR(50),
    impact_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE pollution_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    plastic_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE research_team (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
    research_area VARCHAR(50),
    affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    contact_info VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Plastic_Pollution (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Marine_Life (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species VARCHAR(255),
  population INT,
  average_life_span INT,
  reproduction_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Pollution_Sources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_type VARCHAR(255),
  impact_level VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Research_Team (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  field_of_study VARCHAR(255),
  experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE plastic_pollution_study (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date_observed TIMESTAMP,
  plastic_items_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE marine_species (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255),
  average_lifespan INT,
  habitat VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE pollution_sources (
  source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(255),
  region VARCHAR(255),
  impact_description VARCHAR(500)
)

CREATE TABLE research_team (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(255),
  lead_researcher VARCHAR(255),
  research_institution VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE observation_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  observation_id INT,
  species_id INT,
  source_id INT,
  observation_date TIMESTAMP,
  observation_notes VARCHAR(500)
)
